name: Ariados
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It spins thread from both its rear and its mouth. Then it wraps its prey up in thread and sips their bodily fluids at its leisure.

attacks.name: Reactive Poison
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spider Trap
attacks.effect: You may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
